content: {"name": "Grace Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Requirements: Only a simple form with a few personal details is needed to receive food.\n\nIf the food pantry will be closed, there will be an announcement made outside the pantry 2 weeks before the scheduled closure.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.gcfcconnect.org/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4215 Wendell Drive Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30336", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7690423, "longitude": -84.52459449999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 841-2533", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
